definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There are female hormones that target this fat at that time.
sentences.chinese: 這時雌性激素會作用於這些脂肪。

sentences.english: Oral contraceptives work by reducing androgens .
sentences.chinese: 口服避孕藥，會減少雄性激素。

sentences.english: On the other hand, he did have extremely low levels of the sex hormone testosterone.
sentences.chinese: 而另一方面，他的性激素睾丸酮水平確實極度低下。

sentences.english: Abuse of male hormones can also lead to women appear masculine phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 濫用雄性激素也可導致婦女出現男性化現象。

sentences.english: Things begin to change when the sex hormones begin to circulate.
sentences.chinese: 當性激素開始流通之後，情況纔會發生變化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of Cyproheptadine on serum sex hormone concentrations in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究賽庚啶對大鼠血清性激素含量的影響。

sentences.english: In girls, breast growth is caused by high levels of estrogen.
sentences.chinese: 女孩的胸部發育是因爲雌性激素的大量分泌。

sentences.english: Do you know what estrogen is?
But male hormones fall more gradually, though the decline is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 但雄性激素下降的速度緩慢得多，雖然下降的量很大。

sentences.english: Besides being a sex hormone, testosterone also governs appetite for risk.
sentences.chinese: 睾酮不僅是一種性激素，也決定着人的風險偏好。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the polysynthetic effect of lead on the secretion of androgen.
sentences.chinese: 目的綜合分析鉛對男性性激素分泌的影響。

sentences.english: Testosterone is an androgen or male steroid hormone.
sentences.chinese: 睾丸甾酮是一種雄性激素或雄性類固醇激素。

sentences.english: The hair grows because they have abnormally high levels of the 'masculinising' androgen hormones.
sentences.chinese: 女性多毛症源於女性體內的雄性激素水平過高。

sentences.english: Which food androgen contents are high?
sentences.chinese: 哪些食物雄性激素含量高？

sentences.english: Just before and during your period, levels of progesterone and estrogen decrease.
sentences.chinese: 在經期前以及經期間，孕激素和雌性激素會減少。

sentences.english: How is the relationship between the red goral's rutting behavior and sex hormone.
sentences.chinese: 發情行爲與性激素之間呈現怎樣的關係。

definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
testosterone/abbr. for 睾丸甾酮[gao1 wan2 zai1 tong2]
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
